subject: Simsonn Pro X Ultra pedals and Simhub
description_text:
Hello support,

is it possible to manage VAM linear motors by Simhub?

is it possible to manage rbg stripes by Simhub?

thanks

Francesco

conversations.body_text: Hi Bistospam,    Sorry, Simhub does not support lighting control for the Pro X Ultra.
Yes, you can manage VAM linear motors through Simhub.

Thanks for your reply,

do you consider to help Simhub developers to add this feature to Simhub? It could be useful

> Il 24/09/2025 11:16 CEST support@simsonn.com
